search.name: Maps with viamichelin.com
search.description:
Find a map to any place in Europe with viamichelin.com
Optional switch:
/size:{0|100|25|5|1} - map size (in km). Defaults to 0 (automatic).
Examples:
viam place Berland, Bordeaux
viam rimini /size:100
